mip.description: RFMIP assess the accuracy of instantaneous radiative forcing calculations for greenhouse gases and aerosols in each model by comparing these to reference calculatinos across a range of states representative of present-day, past and future climates.
mip.keywords: radiative forcing, ERF, effective radiative forcing, aerosols
mip.label: RFMIP
mip.rationale: (a) Characterizing the global and regional effective radiative forcing for each model for historical and 4×CO2 simulations; (b) assessing the absolute accuracy of clear-sky radiative transfer parameterizations; (c) identifying the robust impacts of aerosol radiative forcing during the historical period.

piClim-spAer-aer.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.   Aerosols and ozone set to present day (2015) values and other anthropogenic forcing agents are set at pre-industrial values.  Aerosols are specified by RFMIP. Run for 30 years.
piClim-spAer-aer.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, PD aer O3, present day aerosols and ozone, uncoupled, atmosphere-land, specified aerosol
piClim-spAer-aer.long_name: RFMIP aerosols and ozone effective radiative forcing with specified aerosols
piClim-spAer-aer.rationale: Quantify present-day effective radiative forcing (ERF) by aerosols and ozone.

piClim-lu.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Land use is set to present day (2014) values, other forcing agents are specified at pre-industrial values.  Run for 30 years.
piClim-lu.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, PD LU, present day land use, 2015 land use, uncoupled, atmosphere-land
piClim-lu.long_name: effective radiative forcing by present day land use
piClim-lu.rationale: Quantify present-day effective radiative forcing (ERF) by land use changes.

piClim-histall.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Transient forcing to be consistent with historical forcing used in the DAMIP hist-all experiment and future forcing to be consistent with the ScenarioMIP SSP2 RCP4.5 scenario forcing.  A small ensemble of three simulations from 1850-2100.
piClim-histall.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, Historical, Scenario, RCP4.5, fixed SST
piClim-histall.rationale: For diagnosing time-evolving effective radiative forcing (ERF) from all agents.

ssp245.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with medium radiative forcing by the end of the century.  Following approximately RCP4.5 global forcing pathway with SSP2 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 4.5 W/m2 in 2100. Concentration-driven.
ssp245.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP2, RCP4.5, future,  Medium forcing, SSP-based RCP
ssp245.long_name: update of RCP4.5 based on SSP2
ssp245.rationale: The scenario represents the medium part of the range of plausible future pathways.

hist-spAer-all.description: A historical (1850-2014) experiment using a coupled AOGCM in which aerosol optical properties including cloud-radiation interactions are prescribed by RFMIP.  Other forcings to be consistent with the historical forcing used in the DAMIP experiments.  One ensemble member required for RFMIP.  Four ensemble members required for inclusion in DAMIP.
hist-spAer-all.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, historical, all forcings, specified aerosol
hist-spAer-all.long_name: historical simulations with specified anthropogenic aerosols
hist-spAer-all.rationale: To determine which aspects of the historical record robustly emerge from ensembles in which the radiative forcing by anthropogenic aerosols is tightly constrained.

piClim-4xCO2.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea suface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology. Carbon Dioxide concentrations set to 4 times Pre-Industrial values, other forcing agents are specified at pre-industrial values. Run for 30 years.
piClim-4xCO2.rationale: Quantify the effective radiative forcing (ERF) of 4xCO2.

piClim-aer.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Aerosols are set to present day (2014) values, other forcing agents are specified at pre-industrial values.  Run for 30 years.
piClim-aer.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, PD aer O3, present day aerosols and ozone, uncoupled, atmosphere-land
piClim-aer.long_name: effective radiative forcing by present day aerosols
piClim-aer.rationale: Quantify present-day effective radiative forcing (ERF) by aerosols and ozone.

piClim-spAer-anthro.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology. Anthropogenic forcing agents are specified at present day 2014 values. Aerosols are specified by RFMIP. Run for 30 years.
piClim-spAer-anthro.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, Present day anthropogenic forcing, uncoupled, atmosphere-land, specified aerosol
piClim-spAer-anthro.long_name: effective radiative forcing at present day with specified anthropogenic aerosol optical properties, anthropogenic forcings
piClim-spAer-anthro.rationale: Quantify present-day total anthropogenic effective radiative forcing (ERF).

piClim-spAer-histaer.description: A historical (1850-2014) experiment using an atmosphere-land model with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Transient aerosol forcing specified by RFMIP, other forcing agents are set at pre-industrial levels.
piClim-spAer-histaer.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, Historical, Aerosol forcing, specified aerosol, atmosphere-land
piClim-spAer-histaer.long_name: transient effective radiative forcing with specified anthropogenic aerosol optical properties, aerosol forcing
piClim-spAer-histaer.rationale: To be used in detection and attribution experiments.

piClim-control.description: Fixed SST ERF simulation. Use pre-industrial climatological average SST and sea-ice distributions. Apply pre-industrial concentrations of WMGHG (well mixed greenhouse gases) pre-industrial emissions of NTCF (near-term climate forcers). This is a timeslice experiment of 30 years total.  Provided this experiment is run with the same interactive chemistry and aerosols, this will be the same as the RFMIP piClim-control experiment.
piClim-control.keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, piControl, pre-industrial control, 1850 SST, 1850 WMGHG, 1850 NTCF, near term climate forcers
piClim-control.rationale: To compute the ERF for 1850 and 2014.

piClim-spAer-histall.description: A historical (1850-2014) experiment using an atmosphere-land model with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Transient forcing to be consistent with the historical forcing used in the DAMIP hist-all experiment but with RFMIP specified aerosol properties.
piClim-spAer-histall.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, Historical, all forcings, specified aerosol, atmosphere-land
piClim-spAer-histall.long_name: transient effective radiative forcing with specified anthropogenic aerosol optical properties, all forcings
piClim-spAer-histall.rationale: To be used in detection and attribution experiments

rad-irf.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions. Use RFMIP specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-irf.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, radiative transfer, clear sky, offline, present day, RCP8.5, pre-industrial
rad-irf.long_name: Offline assessment of radiative transfer parmaeterizations in clear skies
rad-irf.rationale: Assess radiative forcing by specific agents and probing sources of parameterisation error.  Clear sky calculations for a set of prescribed atmospehric conditions to identify the degree to which errors in radiative transfer contribute to diverstiy in estimates of instantaneous radiative forcing and how this error depends on the background state of the atmosphere and on the forcing itself.

piClim-ghg.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Greenhouse gases set to present day (2014) values, other forcing agents are specified at pre-industrial values.  Run for 30 years.
piClim-ghg.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, PD GHG, present day greenhouse gas, uncoupled, atmosphere-land
piClim-ghg.long_name: effective radiative forcing by present day greenhouse gases
piClim-ghg.rationale: Quantify present-day effective radiative forcing (ERF) by greenhouse gases.

piClim-histnat.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Transient natural forcing (solar and volcano) to be consistent with historical forcing used in the DAMIP hist-all experiment and future forcing used in the ScenarioMIP SSP2 RCP4.5 scenario.  A small ensemble of three simulations from 1850-2100.
piClim-histnat.long_name: transient effective radiative forcing by natural perturbations
piClim-histnat.rationale: Diagnose transient natural ERF. It is difficult to evaluate transitory volcanic and solar forcing using a time-slice methodology so the full 1850-2100 period is used.

historical.description:
Simulation of recent past (1850 to 2014). 
Impose changing conditions (consistent with observations). Should be initialised from a point early enough in the pre-industrial control run to ensure that the end of all the perturbed runs branching from the end of this historical run end before the end of the control.
historical.long_name: all-forcing simulation of the recent past
historical.rationale: Spans the period of extensive instrumental temperature measurements from 1850 to the present. Evaluate model performance against present climate and observed climate change.

hist-spAer-aer.description: A historical (1850-2014) experiment using a coupled AOGCM in which aerosol optical properties including cloud-radiation interactions are prescribed by RFMIP.  Aerosol forcings to be consistent with the historical forcing used in the DAMIP experiments. Only to be performed by models who are also running simulations for DAMIP.
hist-spAer-aer.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, historical,  aerosol forcing, specified aerosol
hist-spAer-aer.long_name: historical simulations with specified anthropogenic aerosols, no other forcings
hist-spAer-aer.rationale: To determine which aspects of the historical record robustly emerge from ensembles in which the radiative forcing by anthropogenic aerosols is tightly constrained.

piClim-histghg.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Transient forcing with greenhouse gases (GHG) to be consistent with the historical forcing used in the DAMIP hist-all experiment and future forcing in the ScenarioMIP SSP2 RCP4.5 scenario. A small ensemble of three simulations from 1850-2100.
piClim-histghg.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, Historical, scenario, RCP4.5, WMGHG
piClim-histghg.long_name: transient effective radiative forcing by greenhouse gases
piClim-histghg.rationale: For diagnosing time-evolving effective radiative forcing (ERF) from greenhouse gases.

piControl.description: A pre-inudsutrial control simulation with non-evolving pre-industrial conditions. Conditions chosen to be representative of the period prior to the onset of large-scale industrialization, with 1850 being the reference year.  The piControl starts after an initial climate spin-up, during which the climate begins to come into balance with the forcing. The recommended minimum length for the piControl is 500 years.
piControl.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK, Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), pre-industrial, reference, control, climate,
piControl.rationale: Control experiment against which perturbations are compared, it serves as a baseline for experiments that branch from it.  To allow us to determine unforced model variability.  The control experiment should be long enough to extend to the furthest point in time reached by the end of the perturbation experiments,  thus the control should allow us to subtract any residual, unforced drift from all perturbation simulations.

piClim-anthro.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Anthropogenic forcing agents (greenhouse gases, aerosols and land use) are specified at present day, 2015, values. Run for 30 years.
piClim-anthro.keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, Present day anthropogenic forcing, uncoupled, atmosphere-land
piClim-anthro.long_name: effective radiative forcing by present day anthropogenic agents
piClim-anthro.rationale: Quantify present-day total anthropogenic effective radiative forcing (ERF).

piClim-histaer.description: An uncoupled (atmosphere and land) experiment with interactive vegetation in which sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SIC) are fixed at model-specific pre-industrial control climatology.  Apply transient aerosols and their indirect effects consistent with historical forcing used in the DAMIP hist-all experiments and future forcing in the ScenarioMIP SSP2 RCP8.5 scenario.  A small ensemble of three simulations from 1850-2100.
piClim-histaer.keywords: RFMIP, Tier2, Historical, scenario, RCP4.5, Aerosols
piClim-histaer.long_name: transient effective radiative forcing by aerosols
piClim-histaer.rationale: Diagnose transient ERF from aerosols. It is difficult to evaluate transitory volcanic and solar forcing using a time-slice methodology so the full 1850-2100 period is used.

2014anthropForcingSpecAer.description: Agents of anthropogenic forcing, GHGs, Land Use etc with Aerosols specifed by RFMIP
2014anthropForcingSpecAer.label: 2014 Anthropogenic Forcing Specified Aerosols

RCP45wmGHG.description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP4.5 long-lived gases, including CO2, N2O and halogenated gases.
RCP45wmGHG.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5, future, 21st century, SSP2, RCP4.5, Well-mixed Greenhouse Gas, CO2
RCP45wmGHG.label: RCP45 Well Mixed GHG

AOGCMconfiguration.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
AOGCMconfiguration.label: AOGCM Configuration

RFMIP-rad-irf.description: An 18 member forcing ensemble to assess parameterisation error in clear-sky top-of-atmosphere flux changes.
RFMIP-rad-irf.label: RFMIP Rad-irf

HistoricalLandUse.data_link: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)
HistoricalLandUse.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
HistoricalLandUse.label: Historical Land Use

FutureSolarParticleForcing.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
FutureSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
FutureSolarParticleForcing.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

piForcingExcludingGHG.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding greenhouse gases (GHG). See table 2 pincus et al 20016).
piForcingExcludingGHG.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding greenhouse gases, excluding GHG
piForcingExcludingGHG.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding GHG

HistoricalSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, Historical, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.label: Historical Solar Irradiance Forcing

RFMIP-preIndForcingExclAerO3.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding aerosols and ozone.
RFMIP-preIndForcingExclAerO3.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding aerosols, excluding ozone
RFMIP-preIndForcingExclAerO3.label: RFMIP Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding Aerosols and O3

piSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
piSolarIrradiance.description: Pre-Industrial solar forcing. The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes pre-industrial solar forcing (1850-1873 mean).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
piSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, pre-industrial, pi, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
piSolarIrradiance.label: Pre-Industrial Solar Irradiance Forcing

rad-pd-piO3.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with present day (2015) greenhouse gas concentrations and pre-industrial ozone (O3). Use specified atmospheric distributions of present day temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-piO3.keywords: RFMIP, PD GHG, present day greenhouse gas, PI O3, pre-industrial ozone, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd-piO3.label: rad-pd-piO3

piSolarParticleForcing.description: Pre-Industrial solar particle forcing (1850-1873 mean). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
piSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Pre-Industrial, pi, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
piSolarParticleForcing.label: Pre-Industrial Solar Particle Forcing

HistoricalAerosolForcing.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
HistoricalAerosolForcing.label: Historical Aerosol Forcing

PreIndustrialLandUse.data_link: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)
PreIndustrialLandUse.label: Pre-Industrial Land Use

HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Here, we provide an outline of a consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

RFMIP2015Aerosols.description: RFMIP specifed aerosol optical and cloud active properties based on the MACv2-SP prescription for the "present day" which averages aerosol properties for the period between 1985 and 2005.
RFMIP2015Aerosols.label: RFMIP 2014 Aerosols

2014O3.data_link: Ozone and stratospheric water vapour concentration databases for CMIP6
2014O3.label: 2014 O3

HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.description: Historical solar particle forcing (1850-2014). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Historical, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.label: Historical Solar Particle Forcing

2014LU.data_link: Global Gridded Land Use Forcing Datasets
2014LU.description: Impose present day (2014) land use (surface albedo/roughness, transpiration).
2014LU.label: 2014 Land Use

RFMIPhistoricalAerosols.description: Historical aerosol optical properties including cloud-radiation interactions prescribed by RFMIP.  An analytically-described spatial pattern with time-constant spectral variation and time-varying strength (building on the Easy Aerosol experience).
RFMIPhistoricalAerosols.label: RFMIP historical Aerosols

RCP45aer.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP4.5 aerosols including BC and OC.
RCP45aer.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5, future, 21st century, SSP2, RCP4.5, NTCF, aerosol
RCP45aer.label: RCP45 Aerosols

RFMIP-preImdForcingExclCO2.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding CO2. See table 1 in Pincus et al 2016.
RFMIP-preImdForcingExclCO2.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
RFMIP-preImdForcingExclCO2.label: RFMIP Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2

atmosLandConfig.description: An atmosphere-land model with interactive vegetation.
atmosLandConfig.label: Atmosphere-Land Configuration

rad-pd-LGM.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with last glacial maximum (LGM) greenhouse gases (GHG) based on PMIP LGM GHG specifications. Use specified atmospheric distributions of present day temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-LGM.keywords: RFMIP, last glacial maximum, LGM, GHG, greenhouse gas, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd-LGM.label: rad-pd-LGM

RCPVol.description: Impose changing volcanic forcing for RCP scenarios.
RCPVol.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, future, 21st century, volcanic forcing
RCPVol.label: RCP Volcanic

2015GHG.description: Impose present-day (2014) concentrations of greenhouse gases.
2015GHG.label: 2014 GHG

1850NonReactiveWMGHGconcentrations.description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) non-chemically reactive Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas (WMGHG) concentrations.  No methane, nitrous oxide or halocarbons.
1850NonReactiveWMGHGconcentrations.keywords: Pre-industrial, 1850, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG, non-chemically reactive
1850NonReactiveWMGHGconcentrations.label: 1850 Non-Reactive WMGHG Concentrations

preIndForcingExclSolAer.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding aerosols and solar.
preIndForcingExclSolAer.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding aerosols, excluding solar
preIndForcingExclSolAer.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding Solar and Aerosols

165yrs1850-2014.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
165yrs1850-2014.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

PIControlSSTClim.description: Pre-Industrial monthly averaged climatology of sea surface temperatures (SST) generated from at least a 30-year segment of the piControl experiment integration.  These should be prescribed according to the AMIP protocols, whereby interpolated daily data are generated preserving the prescribed monthly average fields.
PIControlSSTClim.keywords: pre-industrial control, SST, sea surface temperature, climatology
PIControlSSTClim.label: piControl SST Climatology

RFMIP-preImdForcingExclGHG.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding greenhouse gases (GHG).  See table 1 in Pincus et al 2016.
RFMIP-preImdForcingExclGHG.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding greenhouse gases, no GHG
RFMIP-preImdForcingExclGHG.label: RFMIP Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding GHG

rad-pdwv-p4K.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with plus 4K atmosphere. Present-day (PD) greenhouse gas concentrations and water vapour with PD plus 4K atmosphere. Use specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pdwv-p4K.keywords: RFMIP, present day, plus 4K, +4K,  aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pdwv-p4K.label: rad-pdwv-p4K

rad-pi.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for pre-industrial (1850) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions. Pre-Industrial (PI) greenhouse gas concentrations with PI atmosphere. Use specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pi.keywords: RFMIP, pre-industrial, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pi.label: rad-pi

radiativeTransfer.description: One dimensional radiative tranfer model, identical to the radiative transfer scheme used in the Atmosphere model.
radiativeTransfer.label: Radiative Transfer

251yrs1850-2100.description: Historical scenario, from 1850 to the end of the 21st century
251yrs1850-2100.label: 1850-2100 251yrs

AGCM-AerConfiguration.description: Use an Atmosphere general circulation model with interactive aerosols.
AGCM-AerConfiguration.keywords: AGCM, Aerosols, AGCM-Aer, Atmosphere General Circulation Model, interactive aerosols
AGCM-AerConfiguration.label: AGCM-Aer Configuration

HistoricalInitialisation.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
HistoricalInitialisation.label: HistoricalInitialisation

rad-pd-3xCO2.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with three times the pre-industrial carbon dioxide concentrations. Use specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-3xCO2.keywords: RFMIP, present day, 3xCO2, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd-3xCO2.label: rad-pd-3xCO2

rad-pd.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions. Present-day (PD) greenhouse gas concentrations with PD atmosphere. Use specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd.keywords: RFMIP, present day, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd.label: rad-pd

rad-pd-4xCO2.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with quadrupled carbon dioxide. Present-day (PD) greenhouse gas concentrations with 4x CO2 and PD atmosphere. Use specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-4xCO2.keywords: RFMIP, present day, 4xCO2, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd-4xCO2.label: rad-pd-4xCO2

rad-pd-piall.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with pre-industrial well-mixed greenhouse gases (WMGHG). Use specified atmospheric distributions of present day temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-piall.keywords: RFMIP,  pre-industrial well-mixed greenhouse gas, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd-piall.label: rad-pd-piall

rad-pd-piN2O.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with present day (2015) greenhouse gas concentrations and pre-industrial nitrous oxide (N2O). Use specified atmospheric distributions of present day temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-piN2O.keywords: RFMIP, PD GHG, present day greenhouse gas, PI N2O, pre-industrial nitrous oxide, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd-piN2O.label: rad-pd-piN2O

rad-pd-piCO2.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with present day (2015) greenhouse gas concentrations and pre-industrial carbon dioxide (CO2). Use specified atmospheric distributions of present day temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-piCO2.keywords: RFMIP, PD GHG, present day greenhouse gas, PI CO2, pre-industrial carbon dioxide, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
rad-pd-piCO2.label: rad-pd-piCO2

30yrs1850-1851.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 1850 for 30 years
30yrs1850-1851.label: 1850-1851 30yrs

rad-pd-0p5xCO2.description: Offline radiative transfer calculations of vertically-resolved broadband-integrated longwave and shortwave fluxes for present-day (2015) clear sky (aerosol-free) conditions with half the pre-industrial carbon dioxide concentrations. Use specified atmospheric distributions of temperature and humidity and surface properties over many profiles.
rad-pd-0p5xCO2.keywords: RFMIP, present day, 0.5xCO2, aerosol-free, clear sky, radiative transfer model
